topic.title: The Best Coffee Shops around Virginia Tech
topic.shortdesc: This topic introduces my collection of the best coffee shops around Virginia Tech in Blacksburg.

body.p: Welcome to my collection of the best coffee shops in the Virginia Tech area. Each location has been evaluated by its location, atmosphere, cost, and food and given an overall rating accordingly. For consistency, I have also tried my favorite drink, a hot chai, at each location and gave it a rating.
